steps: Click on the 'Home' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Editing' group, click on the 'Replace' button.
In the 'Find and Replace' dialog box, enter the text you want to find in the 'Find what' field.
Enter the replacement text in the 'Replace with' field.
Click on the 'Replace All' button to replace all occurrences of the text.
Review the changes made in the document.
